verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> you the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> you the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> him, O you <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
You that <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>LORD;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises to his <S%H8034>name;<s%> for it is <S%H5273>pleasant.<s%>
For the <S%H3050>LORD<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to himself, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for his <S%H5459>peculiar<s%> treasure.
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H1419>great,<s%> and that our <S%H113>Lord<s%> is above <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H3605>Whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2654>pleased,<s%> that <S%H6213>did<s%> he in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and in <S%H776>earth,<s%> in the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8415>deep<s%> places.

He causes the <S%H5387>vapors<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> he <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H1300>lightning<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain;<s%> he <S%H3318>brings<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> out of his <S%H214>treasuries.<s%>
Who <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast.<s%>

Who <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H226>tokens<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> into the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of you, O <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> on <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
Who <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H4428>kings;<s%>
<S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan:<s%>
And <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> for an <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> an <S%H5159>heritage<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Your <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> endures for <S%H5769>ever;<s%> and your <S%H2143>memorial,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> throughout all <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he will <S%H5162>repent<s%> himself <S%H5921>concerning<s%> his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
The <S%H6091>idols<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
They have <S%H6310>mouths,<s%> but they <S%H1696>speak<s%> not; <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have they, but they <S%H7200>see<s%> not;
They have <S%H241>ears,<s%> but they <S%H238>hear<s%> not; <S%H369>neither<s%> is there any <S%H7307>breath<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouths.<s%>
They that <S%H6213>make<s%> them are <S%H3644>like<s%> to them: so is <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H982>trusts<s%> in them.
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron:<s%>
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi:<s%> you that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> which <S%H7931>dwells<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> you the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%>
